channel.title: Kognitwin on Goldydocs
channel.description: Recent content in Kognitwin on Goldydocs

item.title: Generating realtime data
item.description: objective - Generating realtime data to influxdb create task pushDummyRealtimeValues to generate realtime dummy data eg: await context.importPipeline('rt', { id: 'cn:zilong:import:rt', name: 'Cn Zilong Rt Import Pipeline', tasks: [ { 'id': 'push_dummy_realtime_values_emissions', 'task': 'pushDummyRealtimeValues', triggers: { // like /3 run for every 3 minutes "schedule": "0 */3 * * * *" }, 'configuration': { 'source': 'cn:zilong:rt', 'isTaskRunningDuration': { 'seconds': 10 }, 'intervalinMS': 6000, 'forLast': { 'minutes': 1 }, 'tagList': [ { 'tag': 'LAYER_WM100-EQUI', 'range': { 'min': 0, 'max': 100 } } ], 'fromDate': '', 'toDate': '' }, } ], }, { /** * Decide if we should: * - false: Break down the pipelines into tasks and run them individually.

item.title: How to Run LNG in Local Environment
item.description: 本地环境如何跑 LNG poetry >=1.2.2 Install poetry from official docs run (Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://install.python-poetry.org -UseBasicParsing).Content | python - in Windows (Powershell) tip: Python >=3.8.1 如何安装 & 切换 Python 版本可参考条目 5.5 run poetry install under c/repos/Twin/taskworkers/lng-workers/simulation-worker poetry run runMain under c/repos/Twin/taskworkers/lng-workers/simulation-worker install https://github.com/pyenv-win/pyenv-win run pip install pyenv-win --target %USERPROFILE%\\.pyenv tip: pip 可以随安装 python 一起安装 run https://kdic.coding.net/p/lngzhuhaijiangsu/d/lng-python-logic/git/tree/master/rpyc/rpyc-server.py 5.1 run pip install rpyc 5.2 install k-spice and 模型 [k-spice](https://dbinsp-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/g/personal/changli_hao_kongsbergdigital_com/EeXoAhAFWCpOn1FE3ggfjC0BIYFPYkQoeX-NdxJF0yIDuw?e=mUjkkb) [模型](https://dbinsp-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/g/personal/changli_hao_kongsbergdigital_com/EXSZ4zXwudZEo7tj1cP5yp4BRzdafq2l1a9l53fibb8WCw?e=HRRSCh) 5.3 download kspice.cp11-win_amd64.pyd 5.4 paste it to K-Spice install bin64

item.title: How to backup and restore mongodb
item.description: This guide will show you how to backup all mongodb collections from a container and restore them to another container Note: This guide is using Rancher Desktop, for docker, it is similar, one only need to change nerdctl to docker in below commands: Guide: Backup Get into the mongo container you want to backup: # list the mongo container id nerdctl container ls nerdctl exec -it 86c31157db5a bash # run below cmd inside the container mongodump --gzip --archive > dump_`date "+%Y-%m-%d"`.

item.title: How to create node-opcua server image
item.description: How to create node-opcua server image Background 在做实时计算模块时，需要用到 node-opcua 库做为数据源提供实时数据。在本地实现的时候，可以用 localhost 地址作为数据源的接入。但是当 Kognitwin 部署到 dev 环境时，就需要提供一个 node opcua server 的外网地址作为数据源接入。因此将一个 node.js 的应用装入到 docker 容器中， 然后部署到云环境就成为了一种可行的解决方式。 How to use it create Node.js web app 1.1 create package.json file, eg: ```json { "name": "docker_web_app", "version": "1.0.0", "description": "Node.js on Docker", "author": "First Last <first.last@example.com>", "main": "sample_server.js", "scripts": { "start": "node sample_server.js" }, "dependencies": { "node-opcua": "2.103.0" } } ``` 1.2 npm install

item.title: How to create user and roles
item.description: How to create user and roles create "id": "poc_nyh_read_user", roles ref: hello-roles-read-nyh.json 创建账号的两种方式 2.1 方式一： 自己创建用户 （推荐） 1. run `ktw add user` cmd. eg: ```sh ktw add user testuser1 --roles poc_nyh_read_user ``` ```json { "users": [ { "type": "user", "email": "testuser1", "name": "firstName lastName", "roles": [ "poc_nyh_read_user" ], "idp": "keycloak", "idpLink": "kdi_azuread" } ] } ``` 2. run `ktw import` cmd. eg: ```sh ktw import hello-users.json -e dev-tencent ``` ref: [hello-users.

item.title: How to deploy to another environment
item.description: For example, if target is kognitwin:https://poc.kognitwin.cn keycloak: https://login.poc.kognitwin.cn/ run ktw add environmentcmd. eg: ktw add environment poc-a https://poc.kognitwin.cn/api --idp=keycloak --tenantId dev-poc --clientId twin-devicelogin --authServerUrl https://login.poc.kognitwin.cn/ then for deploying to the target, run normal ktw import cmd plus -e poc-a at the end.

item.title: How to run Kognitwin using Rancher Desktop
item.description: How to run Kognitwin using Rancher Desktop download rancher desktop to your PC official website Start Mongo container, eg: nerdctl pull mongo​​:6.0 nerdctl run --name twin-mongodb --restart=always -p 27017:27017 -d mongo:6.0 Start Redis container, eg: nerdctl pull redis​:7.0 nerdctl run --name twin-redis --restart=always -d -p 6379:6379 redis​:7.0 Start influx container, eg: nerdctl pull influxdb:1.8 nerdctl run --name influx --restart=always -p 8086:8086 influxdb:1.8 Note: if you notice an error with server failing to connect with MongoDb at localhost:27017.

item.title: How to send messges
item.description: Reload search config msg: Requisite the search service need to be running { "subject": "admin:search", "type": "'com.kognitwin.search.reloadConfig.v1'" }

item.title: How to set up search feature
item.description: How to set up search feature Add a search template to project.templates. eg(the source, id … need to be updated 替换 source: teams:viz:hul:v3d 为项目定义的source Index 的 key: teams:viz:hul:v3d是该index的识别id，建议根据模板修改 ): { "search": { "indexes": { "cn:zilong:v3d": { "query": { "source": "cn:zilong:v3d", "type": "PIPE,VALV,EQUI,INST,PCOM,SUBE,FILT,SHU,ATTA,FLAN,NOZZ,MECH,STRU,ELEC,PSUP,HVAC,SAFE,TELE,ARCH" }, "projection": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ], "flexDoc": { "id": "id", "field": [ "id", "type" ], "store": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ] }, "options": { "boostFields": { "id": 5 } } }, "cn:zilong:edw:tag": { "query": { "source": "cn:zilong:edw", "type": "Tag" }, "projection": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ], "flexDoc": { "id": "id", "field": [ "id", "type" ], "store": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ] }, "options": { "boostFields": { "id": 5 } } }, "cn:zilong:edw:doc": { "query": { "source": "cn:zilong:edw", "type": "Document" }, "projection": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ], "flexDoc": { "id": "id", "field": [ "id", "type" ], "store": [ "id", "type", "source", "derived" ] }, "options": { "boostFields": { "id": 5 } } } } } } 参考hello-projects.

item.title: How to use OpenDialog in realtime calculator
item.description: How to use OpenDialog in realtime calculator config triggers.contextmenu in rta-rcd-components.json. eg: "contextmenu": { "message": "ShowContextMenu", "value": { "event": "$event", "syncAsset": true, "asset": "$clicked", "template": { "items": [ { "name": "查看历史数据", "message": "OpenDialog", "icon": "info_outline", "value": { "template": { "id": "teams:rta:rcd:dialog:chart:demo", "parameters": { "asset": { "id": "$clicked.id", "source": "$clicked.source" } } } } } ] } } }, ref: rta-rcd-components.json config template "id": "teams:rta:rcd:dialog:chart:demo" in rta-rcd-dialogs.json. eg: { "id": "teams:rta:rcd:dialog:chart:demo", "parameters": { "asset": true }, "defaults": {}, "variables": {}, "dialog": { "id": "$id", "component": "DynamicLayoutDialogComponent", "panelClass": ["w-1/2"], "data": { "layout": { "type": "DynamicLayoutComponent", "components": [ { "id": "chart", "splitLayout": { "displayName": "Chart View", "displayIcon": "show_chart", "isVisible": false }, "cssClasses": "", "type": "ChartGridViewComponent@2", "resizable": { "axis": "x", "position": "end" }, "parameters": [ "rowHeight", "cols", "rtAssetId", "rtAssetSource" ], "defaults": { "rowHeight": "notfit", "cols": 1, "rtAssetId": "", "rtAssetSource": "" }, "layoutConfig": { "name": "Charts View", "icon": "show_chart" }, "inputs": { "gridConfig": { "cols": "$parameters.

item.title: KTW deploys Lingque Cloud
item.description: objective - depoly in alauda standalong feature list v3d(huldra import) search feature edw import pnid import edw links to pnid(Show in split view, open in new tab) influxdb basic version create environment run ktw add environmentcmd. eg: ktw add environment poc-alauda-standalong https://poc.kognitwin.cn/api --idp=keycloak --tenantId dev-poc --clientId twin-devicelogin --authServerUrl https://login.poc.kognitwin.cn/ import root & admin & global & search feature & context menu run ktw importcmd. eg: ktw import -s root admin global -e poc-alauda-standalong ktw import global\templates\cn-search.

item.title: README
item.description: 这是一个给研发做知识管理的平台，请大家积极分享自己的经验，用的好的软件，值得读的书，建议要听的讲座等。 积极主动地参与到咱这个平台的贡献中！

item.title: TerraForm
item.description: How to manage cloud infrastructure with TerraForm What is Terraform ? Terraform is an infrastructure as code (IaC) tool that allows you to build, change, and version infrastructure safely and efficiently. This includes both low-level components like compute instances, storage, and networking, as well as high-level components like DNS entries and SaaS features. Background of Terraform in the PoC In this PoC we did not use Terraform to manage the IaC, but after we deployed the Kognitwin we plan to import the resource of Tencent cloud and try to provide the refer to other cloud platform.

item.title: how to setup timeseries
item.description: Install Influx use v1.8, not v2, so far KT tutorial does not support it. docker pull influxdb:1.8 docker run --name influx --restart=always -p 8086:8086 influxdb:1.8 Run task service /c/repos/Twin: npm run serve -w taskservice Use task pushDummyRealtimeValues to generate dummy data (generate data for 2 sensors ) eg: import { ImportContext } from '@kognitwin/cli'; export async function importSource(context: ImportContext) { await context.importJson(['test-rt.json']); await context.importSource('rt', async (context: ImportContext) => { await context.

item.title: how-to-set-camera-focus-prop-in-v3d
item.description: Here shows how to set the camera viewing distance and angles for v3d: one example config is like below: the distance is in meters. the angles is Euler, angles[0] is for horizontal, angles[1] is for vertical. default viewing angle is from top down. conversion between degree to Euler is: `EULER = DEGREE / 180 * PI ref set the angles: [0, 1.57] to view from equator

item.title: ktw transfer from dev.poc to dev
item.description: 从 dev.poc 迁移所有内容到 dev assets (v3d, edw, pnid) run `ktw transfer`cmd. eg: ```sh ktw transfer transfer\transfer-todev-assets.json ``` ref: [transfer-todev-assets.json](https://kdic.coding.net/p/generaltemplate/d/Twin.hello/git/tree/onboarding-zilong/transfer/transfer-todev-assets.json) files Note: 首先尝试了通过 `ktw transfer` 把 dev.poc 环境中的 `files` 文件下载到本地, eg: ```json { "source": "t", "destination": "local", "defaults": { "sample": true, "batchSize": 10000 }, "data": { "files": [ { "id": "assets", "path": "files/assets/ORM", "overwrite": true } ] } } ``` ref: [transfer-tolocal-files.json](https://kdic.coding.net/p/generaltemplate/d/Twin.hello/git/tree/onboarding-zilong/transfer/transfer-tolocal-files.json) 在 `environments` 环境变量中， 配置 `filesStorage.root` & `filesStorage.SASKey`, eg: ```json { "id": "local", "baseUrl": "http://localhost:8080", "filesStorage": { "root": ".

item.title: run lng-python-logic 遇到的一些问题记录
item.description: run lng-python-logic 遇到的一些问题记录 run poetry install 问题1: python version 不对 当前激活版本： 3.8.0， 实际需要版本： ^3.11 问题2： 使用 pyenv 切换 python 版本 查看已经安装的 python 版本 run pyenv versions 切换python版本 run `pyenv global 3.11.0a1` 问题3: 切换到 python 3.11 后仍然报错。因为 poetry 仍然使用本地缓存的虚拟环境运行 cache virtualenvs 找到缓存目录删除后即可 安装成功： run poetry run main 启动成功：

item.title: switch to realtime view
item.description: switch to realtime view git clone node-opcua repo to your folder eg: C:\projects> git clone git@github.com:node-opcua/node-opcua.git ref: github node-opcua url start opcua server eg: C:\projects\node-opcua>node documentation\sample_server.js ref: sample_server.js opcua config to connect node-opcua server and twin server { "sources": [ { "id": "cn:zilong:rt", "name": "cn:zilong:rt", "type": "opcUa", "options": { "broadcast": true, "history": true, "version": true, "supportsTimeseriesSubscriptions": true }, "pathTransform": "$asset.derived.pathTransform", "transform": { "source": "cn:zilong:rt", "id": "$asset.id", "value": "$event.value.value", "unit": "$asset.derived.unit" }, "server": { "opcUa": { "endpoint": "/UA/MyLittleServer", "applicationName": "NodeOPCUA-Client", "host": "opc.
